img_text: VOTED TO CONDEMN NATIONAL EMERGENCY GOP SENATORS PAUL (KY LEE (UT) COLLINS(ME)MURKOWSKI (AK) ALEXANDER (TN ROMNEY (UT) TOOMEY (PA) MORAN (KS) PORTMAN (OH) WICKER (MS) RU RUBIO (FL BLUNT (MO Did these traitors want to make a name for themselves Well-congratulations; they did... and WTP WILL NEVER FORGET!!!
